snippet.title: Stratagem Lost | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Brave perilous turn-based strategy encounters and uncover dark conspiracies in a broken world. Draft your team of unique characters and have them learn skills from each other. Welcome to hard times — can you recover what's been lost?

Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3041220/Stratagem_Lost/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/hybrid_fiction
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hybridfictiongames/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/people/Hybrid-Fiction-Games/61562369517411/
Discord: https://discord.gg/k3Xc3E3p3z

Composer
- dante gofar

Guitarist
- Jack Durbano

Voice Actors
- Joshua Waters (Howden)
- Allanah Fitzgerald (Carina)
- Dottovu (Anyta, Hazel)
- Heidi Tabing (Sinclair)
- Gerald Hill (Barry)
- Amanda Hufford (Valeren)

This is a shortened trailer, the full trailer will be released on October 14th!

About Hybrid Fiction Games
Hybrid Fiction Games is an indie game duo from South Carolina crafting eclectic experiences with strong presentation and authenticity. Their work is inspired by a wide range of mediums, leading to experimental and thoughtful adventures that come from the heart.
